scripts.update-frontend: cp -r React-Core-Components/api frontend/src && cp -r React-Core-Components/base frontend/src && cp -r React-Core-Components/components frontend/src && cp -r React-Core-Components/pages frontend/src/client-pages && cp -r React-Core-Components/redux frontend/src && cp React-Core-Components/component.css frontend/src/app
scripts.update-core: cp -r frontend/src/components React-Core-Components && cp -r frontend/src/base React-Core-Components && cp -r frontend/src/api React-Core-Components && cp -r frontend/src/client-pages/pages React-Core-Components && cp -r frontend/src/redux React-Core-Components && cp frontend/src/app/component.css React-Core-Components
scripts.app-server: cd .. && cd personal-website && npm run server
